title: MBMBaM 562: It Helps to Have a Cube
description:
Stop everything, we’ve found this year’s one true summer anthem, from one Charles Entertainment Cheese. It bops. It slaps. It rips. It trips. It has us questioning our very existence.


Suggested talking points: Catch Old, Wisdom of the Crowd, Ruminating about Revenants, Munch Squad Trap Edition, Chex Mix Circle

Support AAPI communities and those affected by anti-Asian violence: https://www.gofundme.com/c/act/stop-aapi-hate 

For resources on anti-racism and fighting police violence: https://blacklivesmatters.carrd.co/
author: shows@mbmbam.com (Justin McElroy, Griffin McElroy, Travis McElroy)
